40 // Physical dimensions of the arm
41 
42 const float J1x = 2.0548;
43 const float J1y = 0;
44 const float J1z = 0;
45 
46 const float J2x = 0;
47 const float J2y = -2.25;
48 const float J2z = 0;
49 
50 const float J3x = 0;
51 const float J3y = 1.73;
52 const float J3z = 0;
53 
54 const float J4x = 0;
55 const float J4y = 0.40;
56 const float J4z = 0;
57 
62 struct Vector3
63 {
71  void set(float xx = 0, float yy = 0, float zz = 0)
72  {
73  x = xx;
74  y = yy;
75  z = zz;
76  }
77 
78  float x = 0.0; // Float value x initialized at 0.0
79  float y = 0.0; // Float value y initialized at 0.0
80  float z = 0.0; // Float value z initialized at 0.0
81 };
82 
86 struct Arm
87 {
91  Vector3 J1, J2, J3, J4;
92 
96  Vector3 P0, P1, P2, P3, P4;
97 
102  float q1, q2, q3, q4, q5;
103 };
104 
108 Arm arm;
109 
110 ros::Subscriber angle_sub; // Receives joint angles from the motor translator
111 ros::Publisher marker_pub; // Publishes markers to Rviz
112 
113 int main( int argc, char** argv )
114 {
115  ros::init(argc, argv, "arm_us_graph");
116  ros::NodeHandle n;
117  ros::Rate loop_rate(ROS_RATE);
118 
119  angle_sub = n.subscribe("graph_info", 1, sub_angle_callback);
120  marker_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("visualization_marker", 1);
121 
122  // Set the arm's parts' lengths
123  arm.J1.set(J1x, J1y, J1z);
124  arm.J2.set(J2x, J2y, J2z);
125  arm.J3.set(J3x, J3y, J3z);
126  arm.J4.set(J4x, J4y, J4z);
127 
128  while (ros::ok())
129  {
130  CalculatePositions(); // Calculate positions of P1, P2, P3, P4
131  UpdateGraph(); // Send new markers at positions calculated to visualize in Rviz
132 
133  ros::spinOnce(); // Receive updated joint angles
134  loop_rate.sleep();
135  }
136 
137  ros::shutdown();
138 }
139 
140 void sub_angle_callback(const arm_us_msg::GraphInfo::ConstPtr &data)
141 {
142  arm.q1 = data->angle[0];
143  arm.q2 = data->angle[1];
144  arm.q3 = data->angle[2];
145  arm.q4 = data->angle[3];
146  arm.q5 = -1 * data->angle[4];
147 }
148 
149 void UpdateGraph()
150 {
151  // Create point and line markers
152  visualization_msgs::Marker points, line_strip;
153 
154  points.header.frame_id = line_strip.header.frame_id = "my_frame";
155  points.header.stamp = line_strip.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
156  points.ns = line_strip.ns = "robot_arm";
157  points.action = line_strip.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
158  points.pose.orientation.w = line_strip.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
159 
160  points.id = 0;
161  line_strip.id = 1;
162 
163  // Setup types
164  points.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::POINTS;
165  line_strip.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::LINE_STRIP;
166 
167  // Points scale
168  points.scale.x = 0.2;
169  points.scale.y = 0.2;
170 
171  // Lines scale
172  line_strip.scale.x = 0.1;
173 
174  // Points color to blue
175  points.color.b = 1.0f;
176  points.color.a = 1.0f;
177 
178  // Lines color to green
179  line_strip.color.g = 1.0f;
180  line_strip.color.a = 1.0f;
181 
182  // Get the calculated positions
183  Vector3 temp_pos[5] = { arm.P0, arm.P1, arm.P2, arm.P3, arm.P4 };
184 
185  // Loop through the calculated positions and set the points' and the lines' markers to the calculated positions
186  for (Vector3 pos : temp_pos)
187  {
188  geometry_msgs::Point p;
189  p.x = pos.x;
190  p.y = pos.y;
191  p.z = pos.z;
192 
193  points.points.push_back(p);
194  line_strip.points.push_back(p);
195  }
196 
197  // Publish the points and lines to Rviz
198  marker_pub.publish(points);
199  marker_pub.publish(line_strip);
200 }
201 
202 void CalculatePositions()
203 {
204  // Change joint angles received from degrees to radians
205  float q1 = arm.q1 * M_PI / 180;
206  float q2 = arm.q2 * M_PI / 180;
207  float q3 = arm.q3 * M_PI / 180;
208  float q4 = arm.q4 * M_PI / 180;
209  float q5 = arm.q5 * M_PI / 180;
210 
211  // These equations come from a MotionGenesis script
212  // The arm geometry and rotation points are set,
213  // then MotionGenesis finds an equation that describes the positions of the arm from the origin
214  // These equations can be divided in X, Y and Z components with a dot product
215  // MotionGenesis script can be found in the ArmUs package, in /MotionGenesis/DirectKinematicEquations.txt
216 
217  arm.P1.x = J1x*cos(q1) + J1z*sin(q1);
218  arm.P1.y = J1y;
219  arm.P1.z = J1z*cos(q1) - J1x*sin(q1);
220 
221  arm.P2.x = J1z*sin(q1) + cos(q1)*(J1x+J2x) + J2y*sin(q1)*sin(q2) + J2z*sin(q1)*cos(q2);
222  arm.P2.y = J1y + J2y*cos(q2) - J2z*sin(q2);
223  arm.P2.z = J1z*cos(q1) + J2y*sin(q2)*cos(q1) + J2z*cos(q1)*cos(q2) - sin(q1)*(J1x+J2x);
224 
225  arm.P3.x = J1z*sin(q1) + cos(q1)*(J1x+J2x) + J2y*sin(q1)*sin(q2) + sin(q1)*cos(q2)*(J2z+J3z) + J3x*(cos(q1)*cos(q3)+sin(q1)*sin(q2)*sin(q3))- J3y*(sin(q3)*cos(q1)-sin(q1)*sin(q2)*cos(q3));
226  arm.P3.y = J1y + J2y*cos(q2) + J3x*sin(q3)*cos(q2) + J3y*cos(q2)*cos(q3)- sin(q2)*(J2z+J3z);
227  arm.P3.z = J1z*cos(q1) + J2y*sin(q2)*cos(q1) + cos(q1)*cos(q2)*(J2z+J3z)+ J3y*(sin(q1)*sin(q3)+sin(q2)*cos(q1)*cos(q3)) - sin(q1)*(J1x+J2x)- J3x*(sin(q1)*cos(q3)-sin(q2)*sin(q3)*cos(q1));
228 
229  arm.P4.x = J1z*sin(q1) + cos(q1)*(J1x+J2x) + J2y*sin(q1)*sin(q2) + sin(q1)*cos(q2)*(J2z+J3z) + J3x*(cos(q1)*cos(q3)+sin(q1)*sin(q2)*sin(q3))+ J4x*(cos(q1)*cos(q3)*cos(q4)-sin(q1)*(sin(q4)*cos(q2)-sin(q2)*sin(q3)*cos(q4))) + J4z*(cos(q1)*(sin(q3)*sin(q5)+sin(q4)*cos(q3)*cos(q5))+sin(q1)*(cos(q2)*cos(q4)*cos(q5)-sin(q2)*(sin(q5)*cos(q3)-sin(q3)*sin(q4)*cos(q5)))) - J3y*(sin(q3)*cos(q1)-sin(q1)*sin(q2)*cos(q3)) - J4y*(cos(q1)*(sin(q3)*cos(q5)-sin(q4)*sin(q5)*cos(q3))-sin(q1)*(sin(q5)*cos(q2)*cos(q4)+sin(q2)*(cos(q3)*cos(q5)+sin(q3)*sin(q4)*sin(q5))));
230  arm.P4.y = J1y + J2y*cos(q2) + J3x*sin(q3)*cos(q2) + J3y*cos(q2)*cos(q3)+ J4x*(sin(q2)*sin(q4)+sin(q3)*cos(q2)*cos(q4)) - sin(q2)*(J2z+J3z)- J4y*(sin(q2)*sin(q5)*cos(q4)-cos(q2)*(cos(q3)*cos(q5)+sin(q3)*sin(q4)*sin(q5))) - J4z*(sin(q2)*cos(q4)*cos(q5)+cos(q2)*(sin(q5)*cos(q3)-sin(q3)*sin(q4)*cos(q5)));
231  arm.P4.z = J1z*cos(q1) + J2y*sin(q2)*cos(q1) + cos(q1)*cos(q2)*(J2z+J3z)+ J3y*(sin(q1)*sin(q3)+sin(q2)*cos(q1)*cos(q3)) + J4y*(sin(q1)*(sin(q3)*cos(q5)-sin(q4)*sin(q5)*cos(q3))+cos(q1)*(sin(q5)*cos(q2)*cos(q4)+sin(q2)*(cos(q3)*cos(q5)+sin(q3)*sin(q4)*sin(q5)))) - sin(q1)*(J1x+J2x)- J3x*(sin(q1)*cos(q3)-sin(q2)*sin(q3)*cos(q1)) - J4x*(sin(q1)*cos(q3)*cos(q4)+cos(q1)*(sin(q4)*cos(q2)-sin(q2)*sin(q3)*cos(q4))) - J4z*(sin(q1)*(sin(q3)*sin(q5)+sin(q4)*cos(q3)*cos(q5))-cos(q1)*(cos(q2)*cos(q4)*cos(q5)-sin(q2)*(sin(q5)*cos(q3)-sin(q3)*sin(q4)*cos(q5))));
232 }
